title: Was 700 undocumented persons, including sexual offenders, arrested in El Paso last night?
subtitle: Many readers shared a combined story from a press release issued by the United States Border Patrol as evidence of the need for a 2,000-mile border wall.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Some 700 undocumented migrants, including sex offenders, were arrested overnight by the United States Border Patrol.
